title: Vertical Farming Will Change The Cannabis Industry
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description:
Agrify is a developer of grow solutions for indoor agriculture, primarily for the cannabis market. CEO Raymond Chang joins Rena to discuss why indoor vertical farming will change the industry. CPG as the future of cannabis. Driving science, data and consistency. Importance of genetics and grow environment. Proprietary measures around design and safety. Building cannabis insight.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
